sentence.text: The Rb tumor suppressor gene performs a critical role in controlling cell proliferation and tumorigenesis; it recruits negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II protein into the E2F complexes to repress transcription.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In this study, we demonstrate that mRNA splicing, via spliceosome, RB and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II were significantly expressed in same lung cancer tissues in a tissue microarray (TMA) containing 300 non-small cell lung cancers (NSCLC).

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: High expression level of mRNA splicing, via spliceosome in tumor patients was significantly correlated with poor prognosis in NSCLC (log-rank P for OS = 0.01, log-rank P for DFS = 0.001).
Knockdown of mRNA splicing, via spliceosome reduced colony formation ability of lung cancer cells.
These findings may indicate the involvement of mRNA splicing, via spliceosome in progression of lung cancer by regulating the RB/negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II interaction

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
